name: Xpl
description: Plugin which handle Xpl protocol. This plugin also handle RfxComLan with xpl firmware
author: yadoms-team

HubXplSection.name: Start Xpl HUB
HubXplSection.description: Start an Xpl hub at plugin startup

ipAddress.name: Hub local Ip
ipAddress.description: Set the IP Address of the hub
ipAddress.regexErrorMessage: Must be an ipv4 address like 192.168.0.12
